adrFormatAddress: 316 E 89th St, New York, NY 10128-5037, USA

originalText.text: If I could give zero stars I would. I live in a studio apartment managed by Salon Realty and have been without heat since 11/24/22. I was without heat and hot water from 11/24/22-12/1/22 (when hot water was more or less restored) they still made me paid full rent and as of 12/19/22 they do not give me a date for when heat will be restored. There has not been formal documentation of what’s happening. They didn’t reach out about the issue, I had to be the one to open communication. I have asked for alternatives but aside from giving me spaces heaters that is driving my energy cost up they told me “3 portable heaters are able to keep your apartment warm.” ignoring the cost and the fact that their advice is a fire hazard. I’m still without heat and hot water doesn’t work well in my bathroom in the evenings… this situation is beyond frustrating to say the least.

originalText.text: I live on east 27th at a building managed by salon realty. The location is perfect, less than 2 minute walk to 6 train. The super is great, he keeps the building spotless. Management has always been responsive and helpful. I have been here 5 years, if they don't raise my rent I will stay forever. The ice cream shop attached to the building is awesome.  Restaurant next door is great. Perfect NYC experience. Highly recommend the bldg.

originalText.text: Great real estate manager in Manhattan. In a town full of real estate hacks, Salon Realty is a refreshing change. They listen & attend to their buildings, all without the nasty attitude that is so often found in NYC real estate.

text.text: Great real estate manager in Manhattan. In a town full of real estate hacks, Salon Realty is a refreshing change. They listen & attend to their buildings, all without the nasty attitude that is so often found in NYC real estate.

originalText.text: This company has behaved in a most arrogant and reprehensible manner during this crisis. When asked for a rent reduction due to the tenant and guarantor currently having zero income, their response was “we always raise rents“. They do not deserve your business

text.text: This company has behaved in a most arrogant and reprehensible manner during this crisis. When asked for a rent reduction due to the tenant and guarantor currently having zero income, their response was “we always raise rents“. They do not deserve your business

originalText.text: I have rented from Salon Realty and have only experienced good things. The company is responsive to all my needs and if one person can not help there is always another to step in. Good team work at this company.
